Package nom.tam.fits

Class AbstractTableData

java.lang.Object
nom.tam.fits.Data
nom.tam.fits.AbstractTableData
All Implemented Interfaces:
FitsElement, TableData
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsciiTable, BinaryTable
public abstract class AbstractTableData extends Data implements TableData
Deprecated.
Serves no purpose really. It can be removed in the future, letting AsciiTable extend Data and implement TableData instead.
Just an abstract class to reuse the myData in all subclasses of the HDU's.
Author:
Richard van Nieuwenhoven
